text: Momir Bulatović (Cyrillic: Момир Булатовић; 21 September 1956 - 30 June 2019) became the first President of Montenegro in 1990 and was president until 1998. He was also Prime Minister of the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia (1998–2000). Bulatovic @ Balkanskom ulicom; RTS, 28 March 2010 Bulatović died on 30 June 2019 in Raći, Podgorica, Montenegro from a heart attack at the age of 62. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Politicians from Belgrade Category:Presidents of Montenegro
title: Momir Bulatović
